text: usane jab unakee makkaree kee baaten sunee to unhen bula bheja aur unamen se harek ke lie aasan susajjit kiya aur unamen se harek ko ek chhuree dee. usane (yoosuf se) kaha, "inake saamane aa jao." phir jab striyon ne dekha to ve usakee badaee se dang rah gaee. unhonne apane haath ghaayal kar lie aur kahane lagee, "allaah kee panaah! yah koee manushy nahin. yah to koee pratishthit farishta hai.â€
